{{Infobox battle item |name = Lucky Incense |image = [[File:Bag_Lucky_Incense_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Lucky Incense''. |price = 2000 {{pdollar}} |location =
*[[Lucky Incense#Shops|Shops]] *[[Lucky Incense#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Lucky Incense''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's money gained by 50% for 30 seconds. == Details == +50% Bonus to money gained. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Lavender Town]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|One Island]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Pinkan Island]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Olivine City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Slateport City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Lavaridge Town]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Sootopolis City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Eterna City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Celestic Town]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Sunyshore City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Driftveil City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Lacunosa Town]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Cyllage City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Laverre City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Konikoni City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} |} |} ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Battle items}} {{LootItem|Digletts Cave|Common}} {{LootItem|Rocket Game Corner|Common}} {{LootItem|Silph Co|Common}} {{LootItem|Power Plant|Common}} {{LootItem|Cerulean Cave|Common}} {{LootItem|Sunburst Island|Common}} {{LootItem|Tanoby Ruins|Common}} {{LootItem|Sprout Tower|Common}} {{LootItem|Whirl Islands|Common}} {{LootItem|Meteor Falls|Common}} {{LootItem|New Mauville|Common}} {{LootItem|Mt.
